core:description.text: A delicate stemmed glass cradling a generous pour of deep ruby wine. The liquid catches the light with garnet glimmers at its edges. A complex bouquet of dark fruit and oak rises from the bowl, promising bold flavors and a velvety finish.

containers-core:liquid_container.flavorText: The wine unfolds across the palate with layers of blackberry, plum, and a hint of cedar. Silky tannins give way to a lingering finish of dark chocolate and spice that warms the throat pleasantly.
